rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, E3008, P2001, P3002})
Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {PSC1021, PSC1022, PSC1032, PSC1072}

description: This unit provides an introduction to the techniques and applications of molecular modelling with particular emphasis on methods used in drug design.The unit contains two streams: modelling methods; which introduces quantum mechanics, molecular mechanics, energy optimisation and molecular simulation and modelling applications; which covers quantitative structure-activity relationships (QSAR), pharmacophores, structure-based drug design and homology modelling.This will involve: modelling methods in computational chemistry applications of molecular modelling
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
